verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH1961> in the days <WH3117> of Amraphel <WH569> king <WH4428> of Shinar, <WH8152> Arioch <WH746> king <WH4428> of Ellasar, <WH495> Chedorlaomer <WH3540> king <WH4428> of Elam, <WH5867> and Tidal <WH8413> king <WH4428> of nations; <WH1471>

That these made <WH6213> war <WH4421> with <WH854> Bera <WH1298> king <WH4428> of Sodom, <WH5467> and with <WH854> Birsha <WH1306> king <WH4428> of Gomorrah, <WH6017> Shinab <WH8134> king <WH4428> of Admah, <WH126> and Shemeber <WH8038> king <WH4428> of Zeboiim, <WH6636> and the king <WH4428> of Bela, <WH1106> which <WH1931> is Zoar. <WH6820>
All <WH3605> these <WH428> were joined together <WH2266> in <WH413> the vale <WH6010> of Siddim, <WH7708> which <WH1931> is the salt <WH4417> sea. <WH3220>
Twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> years <WH8141> they served <WH5647> <WH853> Chedorlaomer, <WH3540> and in the thirteenth <WH7969> <WH6240> year <WH8141> they rebelled. <WH4775>

And in the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> year <WH8141> came <WH935> Chedorlaomer, <WH3540> and the kings <WH4428> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him, and smote <WH5221> <WH853> the Rephaims <WH7497> in Ashteroth Karnaim, <WH6255> and the Zuzims <WH2104> in Ham, <WH1990> and the Emims <WH368> in Shaveh Kiriathaim, <WH7741>
And the Horites <WH2752> in their mount <WH2042> Seir, <WH8165> unto <WH5704> El-paran, <WH364> which <WH834> is by <WH5921> the wilderness. <WH4057>

And they returned, <WH7725> and came <WH935> to <WH413> En-mishpat, <WH5880> which <WH1931> is Kadesh, <WH6946> and smote <WH5221> <WH853> all <WH3605> the country <WH7704> of the Amalekites, <WH6003> and also <WH1571> <WH853> the Amorites, <WH567> that dwelt <WH3427> in Hazezon-tamar. <WH2688>

And there went out <WH3318> the king <WH4428> of Sodom, <WH5467> and the king <WH4428> of Gomorrah, <WH6017> and the king <WH4428> of Admah, <WH126> and the king <WH4428> of Zeboiim, <WH6636> and the king <WH4428> of Bela <WH1106> (the same <WH1931> is Zoar) <WH6820> and they joined <WH6186> battle <WH4421> with <WH854> them in the vale <WH6010> of Siddim; <WH7708>

With <WH854> Chedorlaomer <WH3540> the king <WH4428> of Elam, <WH5867> and with Tidal <WH8413> king <WH4428> of nations, <WH1471> and Amraphel <WH569> king <WH4428> of Shinar, <WH8152> and Arioch <WH746> king <WH4428> of Ellasar; <WH495> four <WH702> kings <WH4428> with <WH854> five. <WH2568>

And the vale <WH6010> of Siddim <WH7708> was full of slime pits; <WH875> <WH875> <WH2564> and the kings <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017> fled, <WH5127> and fell <WH5307> there; <WH8033> and they that remained <WH7604> fled <WH5127> to the mountain. <WH2022>
And they took <WH3947> <WH853> all <WH3605> the goods <WH7399> of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah, <WH6017> and all <WH3605> their victuals, <WH400> and went their way. <WH1980>
And they took <WH3947> <WH853> Lot, <WH3876> Abram's <WH87> brother's <WH251> son, <WH1121> who <WH1931> dwelt <WH3427> in Sodom, <WH5467> and his goods, <WH7399> and departed. <WH1980>

And there came <WH935> one that had escaped, <WH6412> and told <WH5046> Abram <WH87> the Hebrew; <WH5680> for he <WH1931> dwelt <WH7931> in the plain <WH436> of Mamre <WH4471> the Amorite, <WH567> brother <WH251> of Eshcol, <WH812> and brother <WH251> of Aner: <WH6063> and these <WH1992> were confederate <WH1167> <WH1285> with Abram. <WH87>

And when Abram <WH87> heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> his brother <WH251> was taken captive, <WH7617> he armed <WH7324> <WH853> his trained <WH2593> servants, born <WH3211> in his own house, <WH1004> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and eighteen, <WH8083> <WH6240> and pursued <WH7291> them unto <WH5704> Dan. <WH1835>

And he divided himself <WH2505> against <WH5921> them, he <WH1931> and his servants, <WH5650> by night, <WH3915> and smote <WH5221> them, and pursued <WH7291> them unto <WH5704> Hobah, <WH2327> which <WH834> is on the left hand <WH4480> <WH8040> of Damascus. <WH1834>

And he brought back <WH7725> <WH853> all <WH3605> the goods, <WH7399> and also <WH1571> brought again <WH7725> his brother <WH251> <WH853> Lot, <WH3876> and his goods, <WH7399> and <WH853> the women <WH802> also, <WH1571> and the people. <WH5971>

And the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him after <WH310> his return <WH7725> from the slaughter <WH4480> <WH5221> of <WH853> Chedorlaomer, <WH3540> and of the kings <WH4428> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him, at <WH413> the valley <WH6010> of Shaveh, <WH7740> which <WH1931> is the king's <WH4428> dale. <WH6010>
And Melchizedek <WH4442> king <WH4428> of Salem <WH8004> brought forth <WH3318> bread <WH3899> and wine: <WH3196> and he <WH1931> was the priest <WH3548> of the most high <WH5945> God. <WH410>
And he blessed <WH1288> him, and said, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be Abram <WH87> of the most high <WH5945> God, <WH410> possessor <WH7069> of heaven <WH8064> and earth: <WH776>

And blessed <WH1288> be the most high <WH5945> God, <WH410> which <WH834> hath delivered <WH4042> thine enemies <WH6862> into thy hand. <WH3027> And he gave <WH5414> him tithes <WH4643> of all. <WH4480> <WH3605>
And the king <WH4428> of Sodom <WH5467> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Abram, <WH87> Give <WH5414> me the persons, <WH5315> and take <WH3947> the goods <WH7399> to thyself.

And Abram <WH87> said <WH559> to <WH413> the king <WH4428> of Sodom, <WH5467> I have lifted up <WH7311> mine hand <WH3027> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> the most high <WH5945> God, <WH410> the possessor <WH7069> of heaven <WH8064> and earth, <WH776>

That I will not <WH518> take from a thread <WH4480> <WH2339> even to <WH5704> a shoelatchet, <WH8288> <WH5275> and that I will not <WH518> take <WH3947> any thing <WH4480> <WH3605> that <WH834> is thine, lest <WH3808> thou shouldest say, <WH559> I <WH589> have made Abram rich: <WH6238> <WH853> <WH87>

Save <WH1107> only <WH7535> that which <WH834> the young men <WH5288> have eaten, <WH398> and the portion <WH2506> of the men <WH376> which <WH834> went <WH1980> with <WH854> me, Aner, <WH6063> Eshcol, <WH812> and Mamre; <WH4471> let them <WH1992> take <WH3947> their portion. <WH2506>
